attributes.title: Orange ❤️
attributes.review: If I’m being completely honest I wanted to support my president BUT when I opened this app I saw trumps nudes!! 😖😖😖🤢🤢🤢🤢 I was absolutely horrified, I can’t believe children are following this man!

attributes.title: Horrible App😡😡
attributes.userName: s u m a y a h
attributes.review: I downloaded this app to support bunker boy, but it has severe glitches and excessive ads. It is very difficult to navigate and was programmed very terribly. Would not recommended😡. TRUMP 2020🇵🇷🇵🇷🇵🇷🇵🇷🇵🇷🇵🇷
Nothing useful basically this app is a joke like the big orange man himself let's not vote for Trump 2020 folks and let's bring in someone who may do some good.

attributes.title: DO NOT GET THIS APP
attributes.review: I downloaded this app because I wanted some trump merch because i’m a bootlicker. As soon as I did, ALL of my apps were filled with Trump’s nudes. Disgusting! Because of this, I’ll be voting for Joe Biden in November!

attributes.title: DISAPPOINTING!!!☹️
attributes.review: I thought this app was inclusive for ALL ages. But no this president put an age restriction I thought anyone can support, WRONG!!! Also on the app logo it says “let’s keep America great” America was NEVER GREAT.. thank you

attributes.title: ITS A SCAM
attributes.review: Sooooooo..... I really was looking forward to this app but the second I downloaded my phone wouldn’t stop blasting “big b**ty h*es” on repeat. It was a very sad time. I was really disappointed. Welp Chile ennyways acab. Defund the 👮🏻 arrest the cops who k*lled Breonna Taylor.

attributes.title: This app is the devil
attributes.review: As soon as I downloaded it, my phone started glitching and became possesses. It also started overheating almost immediately. It scared me so bad I might have nightmares. DO NOT DOWNLOAD!!!!!!!!

attributes.title: Trump 2020 app
attributes.review: Will there be an app for the iPad?  I can’t use this as it’s for the iPhone, and asks for a phone number to register.  I need to register with an email.

attributes.title: glitchy
attributes.review: i downloaded this app to get information - and be informed, about the president of the united states. however i was deeply disappointed that the app glitched out and showed me this orange white supremest homophobic monster. it definitely wasn't the president of the us. so i'm thinking this massive issue needs to fix this by november 3rd.

attributes.title: chump
attributes.review: i didn’t know what to expect when i downloaded this app and let me tell you it’s even worse than i imagined i had to get a NEW PHONE BECAUSE THERE WAS A VIRUS ON THIS APP and the app smells racist☘️🌿🍃
